entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-07-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • ScrollView and VerticalStackLayout do not resize themselves on iOS #8820
  • If the user hasn't specified a VSM then look at ways to only apply color changes to the "normal" state of a control #8819
    .NET 7
  • Issue with AndExpandLayoutManager in converted application #8816
  • Why Error compiling Android/Windows (Release) Debug Model Compiling NoError #8815
  • CarouselView inside of one of DataTemplates in DataTemplateSelector results in random DataTemplates in Windows #8811
  • ImageSource FromFile Android internal bug? #8809
  • Frame inside CollectionView unable to be selected in Android #8805
  • DataTemplateSelector in CollectionView does not size/measure items properly #8803
  • UI Automation hit testing on CollectionView items hangs Maui app #8801
  • Auto Update MAUI App #8800
  • Can't find global resource dictionary #8799
  • What is an analog of NamedSize for MAUI fonts? #8798
  • Path Shadow Not Working Consistently on Windows #8796
    6.0-servicing
  • SelectionChangedCommand from CollectionView doesn't work #8792

Closed

  • ILogger.LogDebug does not output anything #8818
  • support linux and Android #8802
  • Not able to rollback to specific maui workload version (6.0.312) #8758
  • [Android] Runtime update of IsVisible Property is not working #8804
  • In Blazor webview after viewing image I can't delete it #8776
  • [Android] Canvas shadow didn't get applied for the drawn ellipse #8807
  • Why Error compiling Android/Windows (Release) Debug Mode Compiling NoError #8814
  • ToolbarItem doesn't trigger Command #8795

PullRequests

Created

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.NetAnalyzers from 7.0.0-preview1.22329.1 to 7.0.0-preview1.22368.2 #8822
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • [Android] Avoid to create the Shadow bitmap if is not neccesary (memory consumption) #8817
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/drawing ✏️
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • [build] make sure toolbox images are embedded #8806
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen for Net6 #8797
    area/single project ☝️, partner/tizen

Merged

  • Initial design doc around how Handler Resolution works #4392
  • Fix issue rendering Brushes binding GradientStop colors #7719
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, control-frame, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Fix issue creating ColorStateLists from extension methods #7527
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox, 6.0-sr3
  • MAUI to 6.0.400 #7862
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [android] remove ColorStateList(int[][],int[]) usage #5654
    area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7
  • Older net6 workloads don't support full unpackaged #8813
  • [Tizen] Add the missing patches to net6.0 branch #8791
    platform/tizen, 6.0-sr4

Updated

  • [foldable] Package reference instead of project reference #6514
    do-not-merge, area/controls 🎮, area/infrastructure 🏗️, control-dualscreen, 6.0-servicing
  • Workaround VS Bug with using dotnet 7 workloads #8316
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • Fix DatePicker on Android so that it can GC #8505
    area/controls 🎮
  • Bump Selenium.Support from 4.1.1 to 4.3.0 #8516
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Selenium.WebDriver from 4.1.1 to 4.3.0 #8517
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Bump Microsoft.Web.WebView2 from 1.0.1245.22 to 1.0.1264.42 #8550
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Set Window Parent before initialize the child ContentPage #8653
    t/bug, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix clear button not working on Entry #7992
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • Fix SwitchCell not compliant with best accessibility practices #6899
    area/a11y, community ✨, 6.0-servicing
  • [Android] Fix crash on Picker with null ItemDisplayBinding #8407
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-picker, 6.0-sr3
  • [Android] Avoid create an unnecessary dialog in DatePickerHandler #8561
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-datetimepicker, .NET 7
  • [Android] Fix Entry decoration using a custom Background #8310
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, 6.0-sr3
  • [iOS] Implement IsEnabled property on Editor #7611
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-servicing
  • Remove validation exceptions Slider min/max values #8560
    platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [MacCatalyst] Fix Button appearance on Catalyst using UIDeviceFamily 6 #7841
    t/bug, area/desktop 🖥️, control-button, 6.0-sr3
  • [Windows] Fix Entry placeholder position using VerticalTextAlignment #8684
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr4
  • [Android] Fix issue using Entry IsPassword with IsReadOnly property #8344
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-entry, 6.0-sr3
  • Add Obsolete attribute to MessagingCenter #8765
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/perf 🏎️, .NET 7
  • [Windows] Update Border StrokeTickness even if StrokeShape is null #8520
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️, partner/ui-tools
  • [Tizen] Update resizetizer for Tizen #8298
    area/single project ☝️, platform/tizen, .NET 7
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #8603
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
